PAD_MapMarker.synopsis: In the cursed town, players find a map of Moonrise marked with treasure.

PAD_TreasureDiscovered.synopsis: Player passes a spot at the base of MOO that they'd earlier found marked on a map.

PAD_MapMarker_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MapMarker_0.text: Someone's marked a spot at the base of Moonrise Towers. Worth a look.

PAD_TreasureDiscovered_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TreasureDiscovered_0.text: This is the spot that's marked on that map.
